title: Schema using github_release_simple plugin
description: github_release_simple plugin limits to no board variant and a single file

vendor.description: The vendor of the system which this config represents

board_variant.description: The board variant of the system which this config represents

system.description: The system's id of the system which this config represents

variant.description:
The variant of the system which this config represents
'null' if is 'null'

repo.description: The release file is in which repo

release_filter.description: To filter the github release using the system version, given str is the system version

version_mapper.description: To map the system version to a symver, given str is the system version

asset_filter.description: To filter the file name, given str is the file name

partition_map.description: Partition map. Due to the simple version plugin, only one file

desc_mapper.description: To generate the description of the system

name_mapper.description: To generate the display name for the system
